subject: Basketball
All Star Games
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Elena Delle Donne, the first rookie to lead the W.N.B.A.’s All-Star voting, will miss the All-Star Game on Saturday while recovering from a concussion.
snippet: Elena Delle Donne, the first rookie to lead the W.N.B.A.’s All-Star voting, will miss the All-Star Game on Saturday while recovering from a concussion.
